Post_Title: what is wrong with this son of a b!tch?
Comment_Text: I usually listen to his recommendations but I do my own research after that. I found a small gem like NMDC on which I made 56% profit and am currently holding SBI Cards (currently on 8% profit. Will go down more because of bear market)

Post_Title: Found these shares with my mothers name on them while looking on an old file, Have 5 certificates with 100 shares each, can anyone tell me what are they worth now.
Comment_Text: My late aunt had ₹3000 invested into the SBI IPO. She forgot about it and after her passing her son came to me asking me how much it’s worth. It’s now ₹25 lakhs. But remember, the IPO was in 1995 so it took almost 30 years for it to appreciate that much.
